text: it's a book where you express your
feelings about each day you have I was
like how could I make a book where I
could just took title like one of those
journals no I created this journal it
was a totally an idea he came up with on
his own there was a good day's version
in that bad days version a bad day would
be like when something goes wrong and
good days are basically holidays winning
video game but if you can't find a good
day or a bad day in that day you don't
really have to write about that day
about five years ago sandy was diagnosed
with breast cancer she was diagnosed at
stage 4 my mom she was a real trouper
when we found out I mean she went
camping with us one time
we've always had a conversation in our
family about how it's important to talk
about your feelings or write them down
when Sammy started to get sicker it was
something we talked about a lot dad saw
me with these and they're like that's
awesome dude
I really wanted to show Noah that his
bright idea could help people know I
said something to me today that I
thought was really great he said I want
people to know that they can make a
difference and they can help even if
they're only 7 years old and I thought
that was really a sweet thing I feel
awesome that I could contribute help
them to not have the same thing we went
through I know his mom would be so proud
of what he's accomplished I know she
would be really really proud of what
he's doing
